timeline.author: lacikaaa

timeline.message:
CB-8930 - CM API tracing implemented
- extracting cm api name from stack trace
If I were using the URL, it would contain cluster specific info, like cluster name.
This would cause the number of operations to be infinite and filtering for CM operations would be impossible.
This is why I'm using the CM API's class and method names.
Added unit test for the complicated logic.
Using StackWalker so it does not have a performance impact.
